thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com
thread.title: mike 808-347-0192

author: mike 808-347-0192
title: mike 808-347-0192
text: Not going to lie, I tried 4 other google sites before talking to BRAD RHOADS @ Servicecaster. I always thought the first site you see is the best. Not true. BRAD RHOADS treated me with respect, honor, and dignity that as a customer I felt I deserved. He also is very knowledgeable confirming the part numbers I ordered were a matched set. Haven't received the wheels yet, but if the color, steel inserts, or anything else is wrong with them, the service I got from BRAD RHOADS makes it all worth wild. If there is a problem with them, BRAD RHOADS is the man to make it right. He is one of your employees who should be recognized. Definitely under paid!!!
